name: tcpspy
long_description:
Description
===========

Installs/Configures tcpspy

Requirements
============

* Chef 0.8+

Attributes
==========

Usage
=====

```json
"run_list": [
    "recipe[tcpspy]"
]
```

default
----

Installs/Configures tcpspy

Testing
=====

This cookbook is using [ChefSpec](https://github.com/acrmp/chefspec) for testing.

    $ cd $repo
    $ bundle
    $ librarian-chef install
    $ ln -s ../ cookbooks/tcpspy
    $ rspec cookbooks/tcpspy
